ED_Title: Countering  the use of information and communications technologies for criminal purposes
ED_DecisionText: At its 54th plenary meeting, on 15 December 2022, the General Assembly took note of the report of the Third Committee.  (Footnote: A/77/465.)
ED_Disclaimer: The final version of decisions adopted during the main part of the session will be contained in document A/77/49 (Vol. II) after editorial review.
